title: pixel 2XL touch screen stopped working even after factory reset
content:
Hey guys, 
I have a pixel 2 XL,
it was working fine at night, and when I wake up in the morning with my alarm clock on,
I find that touch screen not working

 I tried soft reset, multiple times, still not working
and finally tried a factory reset, not working,

is there anything i can do?

this happened so randomly as I never had this problem before.

thanks fo much.
